ygData.subject: Re: It's Battle Time
ygData.msgSnippet: Alloran, could you please space out your chars with ~~~~~~~ s or something? Your posts are very hard to read when they re stuffed with action like that. Also,

Alloran, could you please space out your chars with ~~~~~~~'s or 
something? Your posts are very hard to read when they're stuffed with 
action like that. Also, firing the shot limit at like 5 bots is legal 
but un-realistic. I'm not saying its not allowed, but its kinda cheap.

Also, Starlight's darts are tranquilizer darts. If Orion was hit with 
them, he'd be falling asleep quickly.

::Astral/Starlight/Fenox/Perndabot/FZ/Prowl::

Astral ducks under several nails, one of them digging into his 
shoulder. He growls, firing several shots at Torca.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight flipps out her charge launcher, blowing the missile that was 
fired at her apart. The shockwave from the explosion sends her flying 
backwards.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot gets to his feet, his energy levels returning to normal. He 
looks up at the blue energy field and fires. The missile shuts off 
when it goes through the field, falling harmlessly to the ground.

Perndabot turns back to Ratchet, firing a missile at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox dodges the missile, smiling at her success when several shots 
him her in the back. Enraged, she spins around and fires several shots 
at Ratchet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl pulls up sharply right before he hits the ground. FZ lands 
behind him, firing another energy-draining missile at Prowl. The 
Maximal lands, blowing the missile apart from a safe distance.

"How about a one on one, Zardus?" asks Prowl as he walks forward, 
eager to try out his new body. FZ laughs, also stepping forward.

"If you want to die that badly," FZ replies, waiting for Prowl to make 
the first move. The two bots were only three feet away from each 
other.

Prowl lunges forward with a punch. Instantly reacting, FZ knocks the 
punch off-course with a quick block, followed by a punch into Prowl's 
ribs.
